Planar Refuge.name: Planar Refuge
Planar Refuge.flavor: You whisk yourself and all your allies to the astral seed that will one day become your dominion.
Planar Refuge.target: You and each willing ally in the burst
Planar Refuge.effect: You and any targets teleport from your current space and appear in your astral seed. You and your allies can each spend a healing surge and automatically recharge any one encounter power. At the start of your next turn, you and all allies reappear in the space you vacated or the closest unoccupied space.
